mentions.context: For instance, the multichannel signal is mapped to a single-channel first by using BeamformIt 1 [18] or embedding averaging.
To simulate room effects, we have generated an RIR corpus of 10000 rooms for training and 3600 for evaluation with pyroomacoustics toolbox [38].
